#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define lg2(x)(31-__builtin_clz(x))
using namespace std;
#define ll long long

const int MAXN=3e5+7;
const int md1=1004535809,md2=167772161;
int base1,base2;
int _1[MAXN],_2[MAXN],n,m;
int i1[MAXN],i2[MAXN];
char s[MAXN];
int home[MAXN],ccnt;
int mxd[MAXN],toph[MAXN],tail[MAXN],sonh[MAXN],fa[MAXN],len[MAXN],F[20][MAXN],dep[MAXN],idx,dfn[MAXN];
int *up[MAXN],*down[MAXN];
int st[20][MAXN<<1];

inline int inv(int a,const int &P) {
	ll ans=1,b=P-2;
	while(b) {
		if(b&1)ans=ans*a%P;
		a=1ll*a*a%P;
		b>>=1;
	}
	return ans;
}
struct edge {
	int to,nxt;
} e[MAXN<<1];

struct data {
	int s1,s2;
	int len;
	inline void push_front(char c) {
		s1=(s1+1ll*c*_1[len])%md1,s2=(s2+1ll*c*_2[len++])%md2;
	}
	inline void push_back(char c) {
		s1=(1ll*s1*base1+c)%md1,s2=(1ll*s2*base2+c)%md2,++len;
	}
	inline data operator+(const data &rhs)const {
		return (data) {
			(1ll*s1*_1[rhs.len]+rhs.s1)%md1,(1ll*s2*_2[rhs.len]+rhs.s2)%md2,len+rhs.len
		};
	}
	inline bool operator==(const data &rhs)const {
		return s1==rhs.s1&&s2==rhs.s2&&len==rhs.len;
	}
} a[MAXN],b[MAXN];

inline void dfs(int nw) {
	st[0][dfn[nw]=++idx]=nw;
	sonh[nw]=0,mxd[nw]=dep[nw];//mxdå°±æ˜¯maxdep
	a[nw]=a[fa[nw]],b[nw]=b[fa[nw]];
	a[nw].push_back(s[nw]),b[nw].push_front(s[nw]);
	for(int i=home[nw]; i; i=e[i].nxt) {
		int v=e[i].to;
		if(!dep[v]) {
			dep[v]=dep[nw]+1;
			fa[v]=F[0][v]=nw;
			dfs(v);
			st[0][++idx]=nw;
			if(mxd[v]>mxd[nw])mxd[nw]=mxd[v],sonh[nw]=v;
		}
	}
}
inline void dfs2(int nw) {
	tail[toph[nw]]=nw;
	len[toph[nw]]=dep[nw]-dep[toph[nw]]+1;
	if(sonh[nw])toph[sonh[nw]]=toph[nw],dfs2(sonh[nw]);
	for(int i=home[nw]; i; i=e[i].nxt) {
		int v=e[i].to;
		if(dep[v]>dep[nw]&&v!=sonh[nw])dfs2(toph[v]=v);
		//æ ‡å‡†é•¿é“¾å‰–åˆ†
	}
}

inline int kfa(int x,int k) {
	if(dep[x]<=k)return 0;
	if(k==0)return x;
	const int lg=lg2(k);
	x=F[lg][x],k-=1<<lg;
	if(!k)return x;
	const int dlt=dep[x]-dep[toph[x]];
	if(dlt>=k)return down[toph[x]][dlt-k];
	return up[toph[x]][k-dlt];
}

inline int LCA(int x,int y) {
	if(dfn[x]>dfn[y])swap(x,y);
	x=dfn[x],y=dfn[y];
	int lg=lg2(y-x+1);
	int a=st[lg][x],b=st[lg][y-(1<<lg)+1];
	return (dep[a]<dep[b])?a:b;
}

inline void init() {

		}

			}
			for(int j=1,nw=sonh[i]; j<=h&&nw; ++j,nw=sonh[nw]) {

			}
		}
	}
	for(int i=1; i<20; ++i) {

			int x=st[i-1][j],y=st[i-1][j+(1<<i-1)];
			st[i][j]=(dep[x]<dep[y])?x:y;//stÂ±Ã­Â¿Ã¬Â°Â¡
		}
	}
}

inline data get(int u,int v) {

	};

inline data get_(int u,int v) {

		(y.s1-1ll*x.s1*_1[y.len-x.len]%md1+md1)%md1,(y.s2-1ll*x.s2*_2[y.len-x.len]%md2+md2)%md2,y.len-x.len//æš´åŠ›æˆªå–2
	};

int main() {

	for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i)_1[i]=1ll*_1[i-1]*base1%md1,_2[i]=1ll*_2[i-1]*base2%md2;
	i1[1]=inv(base1,md1);
	i2[1]=inv(base2,md2);
	for(int i=2; i<=n; ++i) {
		i1[i]=1ll*i1[i-1]*i1[1]%md1,i2[i]=1ll*i2[i-1]*i2[1]%md2;
	}
	for(int i=1; i<n; ++i) {
		int u,v;
		scanf("%d%d",&u,&v);
		e[++ccnt]=(edge) {v,home[u]},home[u]=ccnt;
		e[++ccnt]=(edge) {u,home[v]},home[v]=ccnt;
	}
	dfs(dep[1]=1),dfs2(toph[1]=1);
	init();
	//for(int i=1;i<=n;++i)printf("%d %d %d\n",dep[i],toph[i],fa[i]);
	//puts("qwq");
	for(scanf("%d",&m); m--;) {
		int u1,v1,u2,v2;
		scanf("%d%d%d%d",&u1,&v1,&u2,&v2);
		int L1=LCA(u1,v1),L2=LCA(u2,v2);
	//	printf("%d %d\n",L1,L2);
		const int D1=dep[u1]+dep[v1]-2*dep[L1]+1,D2=dep[u2]+dep[v2]-2*dep[L2]+1;//æ‰¾åˆ°é•¿åº¦
		int l=1,r=min(D1,D2),ans=0;
		while(l<=r) {
			const int mid=l+r>>1;
			const data _x=dep[u1]-mid+1>=dep[L1]?get(u1,kfa(u1,mid)):get(u1,L1)+get_(fa[L1],kfa(v1,D1-mid));//è¦ä¹ˆåœ¨LCAå·¦è¾¹è·¯å¾„,è¦ä¹ˆå·¦è¾¹å…¨éƒ¨å’Œå³è¾¹kçº§ç¥–å…ˆåä¸²
			const data _y=dep[u2]-mid+1>=dep[L2]?get(u2,kfa(u2,mid)):get(u2,L2)+get_(fa[L2],kfa(v2,D2-mid));
			if(_x==_y)l=(ans=mid)+1;
			else r=mid-1;
		}//å³å¯
		printf("%d\n",ans);
	}
}

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long

namespace fastIO {
#define BUF_SIZE (1<<19)
	static char buf[BUF_SIZE],*p1=BUF_SIZE+buf,*pend=BUF_SIZE+buf;
	inline char nc() {
		if(p1==pend) {
			p1=buf;
			pend=buf+fread(buf,1,BUF_SIZE,stdin);
		}
		return *p1++;
	}
	inline ll read() {
		ll x=0,f=1;
		register char s=nc();
		for(; !isdigit(s); s=nc())if(s=='-')f=-1;
		for(; isdigit(s); s=nc())x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+s-'0';
		return x*f;
	}
}
using namespace fastIO;

const int MAXN=1e5+7;
int n,ans;
struct rec {
	int to,nxt,w;
} e[MAXN*2];
int home[MAXN],tot,rt,fa[MAXN],p[MAXN],siz[MAXN],vis[MAXN];
ll dis[MAXN],d[MAXN];

inline void add(int w,int u,int v) {
	e[++tot]=(rec) {
		v,home[u],w
	};
	home[u]=tot;
	e[++tot]=(rec) {
		u,home[v],w
	};
	home[v]=tot;
}

void dfs(int u,int fa) {
	d[u]=max(d[u],dis[u]);
	if(dis[u]>dis[rt])rt=u;
	for(int i=home[u]; i; i=e[i].nxt) {
		int v=e[i].to;
		if(v!=fa)dis[v]=dis[u]+e[i].w,dfs(v,u);
	}//è¿™é‡Œåšä¸€ä¸‹dp,æ‰¾åˆ°è·ç¦»æœ€è¿œè€…
}

int find(int x) {
	if(fa[x]==x)return x;
	return fa[x]=find(fa[x]);
}

void merge(int x,int y) {
	x=find(x);
	y=find(y);
	if(x==y)return ;
	if(siz[y]>siz[x])swap(x,y);
	siz[x]+=siz[y];//å¯å‘å¼åˆå¹¶
	ans=max(ans,siz[x]);
	fa[y]=x;
}

bool cmp(const int &a, const int &b) {
	return d[a]<d[b];
}

int main() {
//	freopen("test.in","r",stdin);
	n=read();
	for(int i=1; i<n; ++i)add(read(),read(),read());
	dfs(1,0);
	int tmp=rt;
	dis[rt]=0;
	rt=0;
	dfs(tmp,0);//æ‰¾ åˆ° ç›´ å¾„
	//å¹¶å®Œæˆd
	dis[rt] =0;
	dfs(rt,0);

	for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i)p[i]=i;
	sort(p+1,p+n+1,cmp);
	//æŠŠç‚¹æŒ‰ç…§då€¼æ’åº
	int q=read();
	ll lim;
	while(q-->0) {
		lim=read();
		for(int i=1; i<=n; ++i)fa[i]=i,siz[i]=1,vis[i]=0;
		//init
		ans=1;
		for(int k=n,j=n; k>=1; --k) {
			while(d[p[j]]>d[p[k]]+lim) {
				//jè¿™ä¸ªç‚¹ä¸è¡Œ
				//å¼¹å‡ºæ¥
				--siz[find(p[j])];
				--j;
				//æ¢ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªçš„å•¦
			}
			vis[p[k]]=1;
			//ç›¸å½“äºæˆ‘ä»¬å·¦ç«¯ç‚¹é æšä¸¾,å³ç«¯ç‚¹å°ºå–
			for(int i=home[p[k]]; i; i=e[i].nxt) {
				int v=e[i].to;
				if(vis[v])merge(p[k],v);
				//mergeä¸€ä¸‹è¡¨ç¤ºé‚£äº›ç‚¹éƒ½å½’æˆ‘ç®¡
				//ä¸»è¦æ˜¯ä¸ºäº†ansçš„æ›´æ–°---å–æœ€å¤§è¿é€šå—
			}
		}
		printf("%d\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
const int MAXN=107;
const int P=1e9+9;
int n,m,d[MAXN],w[MAXN],b[MAXN],s[MAXN],S;
vector<int> e[MAXN];
ll p[MAXN],v[MAXN],vp[MAXN],f[MAXN][MAXN],ans[MAXN];

inline int read() {
	int x=0,f=1;
	char s=getchar();
	for(; !isdigit(s); s=getchar());
	for(; isdigit(s); s=getchar())x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+s-'0';

}

inline ll C(int a,int b) {
	return p[a]*vp[b]%P*vp[a-b]%P;
}

void dfs(int x,int o,int &s) {
	b[x]=o,++s;//æ‹‰å‡ºæ¯ä¸ªç‚¹æ‰€å±çš„è·Ÿ
	for(unsigned int i=0; i<e[x].size(); ++i) {
		int y=e[x][i];
		if(!d[y]&&!b[y])dfs(y,o,s);
	}
	return ;
}

inline void dp(int x,int fa) {
	s[x]=1,f[x][0]=1;
	for(unsigned int i=0; i<e[x].size(); ++i) {
		int y=e[x][i];
		if(b[x]!=b[y]||y==fa)continue;
		dp(y,x);
		for(int j=0; j<s[y]; ++j)f[x][s[x]+j]=0;
		for(int j=s[x]-1; ~j; --j) {//æ³¨æ„è¿™é‡Œè¦å‡1
			for(int k=1; k<=s[y]; ++k) {
				f[x][j+k]=(f[x][j+k]+f[x][j]*f[y][k]%P*(C(j+k,j))%P)%P;
				//åŒä¸€æ£µæ ‘ä¸Šç›¸å½“äºdpäº†é¡ºåº
			}
		}
		s[x]+=s[y];//sizçš„æ„æ€
	}
	f[x][s[x]]=f[x][s[x]-1];//åªèƒ½è¿™ä¹ˆè½¬ç§»äº†
}
